name: Supernaut
description: Sergeant Milo Fields was recruited for the Order and regained the use of his legs after his nervous system intermingled with that of Aralune.

wiki.relatives: Unnamed father, unnamed grandfather, unnamed great-grandfather
wiki.powers: Milo is a regular human being given [[Glossary:S#superhuman|superhuman]] powers for one year.
wiki.abilities: His armor possesses a wide array of capabilities, including flight, telescopic vision, and a high-tech weapons system.
wiki.paraphernalia: Fields' neck and spine are outfitted with input ports hardwired into his neural networks that allow him to telepilot the Supernaut armor.
wiki.bio_text: A former US Marine, Fields was taken hostage while delivering humanitarian aid in East Africa. After his release, he returned to the US and protested the inaccurate public coverage of his capture, culminating in him getting shot in the spine and rendered paraplegic during a Memorial protest. He was recruited for the Order and regained the use of his legs after his nervous system intermingled with that of [[Aralune]].
